name: Cappasity
description: Cappasity is a cloud-based platform that lets you easily create and deliver 3D, VR and AR shopping experiences to your customers. Cappasity is a full pipeline solution that allows businesses quickly and easily create and embed 3D content into their websites, mobile apps and VR/AR applications. Cappasity solution works 10 times faster compared to competitors and optimized for production of thousands SKU per day. Cappasity proprietary 3D format allows viewing the 3D Images 4x faster from any types of devices.
